tool_description:
Trigger notifications on your devices using our API. Now Push seamlessly connects your devices together, our app runs on any device, on any operating system, on your phone, your tablet, your mac, your PC, your browser, with Zapier, or headless using our API. 

How to get your API Key

Step 1: Download Now Push, on any platform
Step 2: Then Login or Sign up
Step 3: Then go to the Account Tab
Step 4: The tap on the section that says "Show API Key"
Step 5: This will display your API key, you can...
name: Now Push
